channel.title: Adding External Control Inputs to the Axoloti Synthesizer (Video)
channel.description:
I finally got around to adding jacks for an expression pedal and sustain pedal. But I recorded the process and made a video, and of course dropped some music from the Axoloti in the background. Not as fancy as some of the awesome hardware projects being done, but just thought I'd share :slight_smile:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qL1zwikiPg8
